level.heading: Fuel provider requirements.
level.text: Pursuant to § 246(e) of the Clean Air Act, fuel providers shall make clean fuels available to covered fleet operators at locations at which covered fleet vehicles are fueled.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-201, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 50-701.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: "Section 246(e) of the Clean Air Act," referred to in this section, is codified as 42 U.S.C. § 7586(e).
